entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Friday 28 April 2023
